page.title: 18Entertainment
page.content: Youth Club The Rawcliffe Bridge Youth Club is held twice a week on Mondays and Thursdays from 7 o'clock to 9.30. At the youth club you can play snooker, pool, and badminton. The youth club is held at Rawcliffe Bridge school and youth lounge. If you are a member of a youth club you pay 10p to get in but if you are not a member you pay 20p. You can buy crisps and pop and other things like that. On hot days in summer the people play cricket and rounders or just mess about on the field. In winter the people from this youth club go inside and play badminton, they dance to the music and after they have danced they have a drink and something to eat. On Monday they buy a bag of chips from the Nippy Chippy.
